settings.label: Email Templates
settings.confirm: Are you sure you want to revert to the stock email template for
settings.notificationHelp: It is recommended to use "$forumStyle" for these emails as they may contain BBCODE. These emails also have "$user" available which contains the entire user model of the user being emailed.
settings.help: "$body" will contain the actual content of the email, "$forumStyle" contains the entire forum CSS, "$url" is Flarums UrlGenerator, "$settings" allows you to interact with the SettingsRepositoryInterface, and "$link" contains the link within the email. See each template for how to use each variable.

css_settings.label: CSS settings
css_settings.help: You can choose to include the forum's CSS in the email's HTML code. If you enable this, you may have issues with certain email providers.
